original_text: Then fell she down straightway at his feet, and yielded up the ghost: and the young men came in, and found her dead, and, carrying her forth, buried her by her husband.
korean_text: 곧 그가 베드로의 발 앞에 엎드러져 혼이 떠나는지라 젊은 사람들이 들어와 죽은 것을 보고 메어다가 그의 남편 곁에 장사하니

sentences.original_text: Then fell she down straightway at his feet
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 그의 발 앞에 즉시 쓰러졌습니다

sentences.original_text: and the young men came in
and, carrying her forth, buried her
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀를 밖으로 메고 나가 매장했습니다
